name: Cube IO
description:
Play with players and try to become the biggest cube cell of them all!

Control your tiny cube cell and eat other players to grow larger!
Players bigger than you will be trying to eat you.
Survive and eat all them to become the biggest cube cell in the game!

Simple one touch control, cube.io made addictive gameplay!
Use splitting tactics to catch other players - or avoid them!
Use a variety of super skins!
